heading:
Any owner of a building or structure shall notify the department in writing that such building or structure has
   become potentially compromised immediately after such owner knows or should have known of the condition
text:
Such notice shall
   contain the name and business address of the owner of record of such building or structure and shall identify the building or
   structure by street address and tax block and lot. The notices required by this subdivision shall be in such form and manner as
   established by the commissioner by rule.
